channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX

item.title: CVE-2021-34377|2024-08-04T00:12:49.966Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in the HDCP service TA where bounds checking in command 9 is missing. Improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer might lead to escalation of privileges, information disclosure, and denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-34375|2024-08-04T00:12:49.957Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in all trusted applications (TAs) where the stack cookie was not randomized, which might result in stack-based buffer overflow, leading to denial of service, escalation of privileges, and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2021-34374|2024-08-04T00:12:48.697Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in command handlers where the length of input buffers is not verified. This vulnerability can cause memory corruption, which may lead to information disclosure, escalation of privileges, and denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-34378|2024-08-04T00:12:50.370Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in the HDCP service TA where bounds checking in command 11 is missing. Improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer might lead to information disclosure, denial of service, or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2021-34379|2024-08-04T00:12:50.243Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in the HDCP service TA where bounds checking in command 10 is missing. The length of an I/O buffer parameter is not checked, which might lead to memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2021-34383|2024-08-04T00:12:49.628Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Bootloader contains a vulnerability in NVIDIA MB2 where a potential heap overflow might lead to denial of service or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2021-34376|2024-08-04T00:12:49.998Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Trusty contains a vulnerability in the HDCP service TA where bounds checking in command 5 is missing. Improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer might lead to denial of service, escalation of privileges, and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2021-34384|2024-08-04T00:12:49.913Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Bootloader contains a vulnerability in NVIDIA MB2 where a potential heap overflow could cause memory corruption, which might lead to denial of service or code execution.
